痮字的基本解释

痮
zhàng
古同“胀”，身体内壁受到压迫而产生不舒服的感觉。

痮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàng］
［《廣韻》知亮切，去漾，知。］
(1)同“脹”。胀满。
(2)四肢难以屈伸之疾。

痮字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痮； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页774第29
【廣韻】丑亮切【集韻】【韻會】知亮切，?音帳。【玉篇】痮，滿也。亦作脹。【集韻】腹大也。【正字通】?胃不和，冷氣客之爲脹滿。通用張。

痮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痮字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
zhàng
Gu Tong "swelled", the inner wall of the body was oppressed and produced an uncomfortable feeling.
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàng］
["Guangyun" knows brightly and cuts, goes to Yang, knows. ]
(1) Same as "expansion". Fullness.
(2) Difficulty in flexion and extension of limbs.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痮; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 774 29
[Guang Yun] Ugly bright cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Know bright cut, sound account. 【Jade articles】Urban, full. Also for inflation. [Jiyun] The belly is also big. [Zhengzitong]? Stomach is upset, and the air conditioner is full. General Zhang.
